channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Potholes, 12th February
item.description:
Huge potholes on this road, just getting bigger daily and could cause great damage to cars! Please fix, thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dulwich, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Complaint Regarding Persistent Dog Fouling on Pavements, 12th February
item.description:
Over the past several weeks, the problem has become significantly worse. There are large amounts of dog waste left on the pavements, sometimes only a few steps apart. This is creating an unpleasant environment for residents and poses a health and safety concern! The pavements are heavily soiled, creating an unpleasant, unhygienic, and hazardous environment for residents. I urge the council to take immediate and visible action to address this matter. This should include increased enforcement patrols, warning signage, fines where appropriate, and regular street cleaning to restore basic standards of cleanliness in the area. Dog waste located on Ridgeway East outside 31, 37, on the corner of Ridgeway East and Leechcroft Avenue as well as on the corner of Ridgeway East and Chester Road. There is MORE on Chester Road outside numbers 38, 18! This is just 5 min walk from mine to Blackfen Road!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Ridgeway East, Blackfen, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bikes blocking pavement and overcrowded at 2-4 Manchester square outside, 12th February

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Manchester Square, Marylebone, City of Westminster

item.title: Back wall of 7 Cavendish Road Kilburn NW6 7XT/ Council owned, 12th February
item.description:
Hi, The wall is crumbling and dangerous, will need replacing. Cavendish Road is Lambeth council but i wonder if Christchurch Avenue is Camden borough. Please could you send someone to have a look at it- best access is via Christchurch Avenue. Many Thanks, Giles

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Cavendish Road, London

item.title: Rubbish on green space, 12th February
item.description:
Several empty wine bottles piled up by PROW. Also box of rubbish dumped on other side of pathway and various other litter on the grass that's been there for weeks. This was previously reported and you closed the case citing it as being the car park area. It is not. It is on the council owned and maintained PROW as can be seen on the map. Please clear away.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 59, Sandpiper Way, St Paul's Cray, Greater London

item.title: There is a very deep hole on the edge of the pavement along with a large crack that has appeared recently., 12th February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 28, Mooreland Road, Plaistow, Greater London

item.title: Blocked drain preventing access to properties & businesses, 12th February
item.description:
